title: The Shawshank Redemption
stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
short_description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

title: The Godfather
stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
short_description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
short_description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

title: The Godfather Part II
stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall
short_description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: 12 Angry Men
stars: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam
short_description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian Mc, Kellen
short_description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Schindler's List
stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
short_description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Pulp Fiction
stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
short_description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
stars: Elijah Wood, Ian Mc, Kellen, Orlando Bloom
short_description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
stars: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef
short_description: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Forrest Gump
stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
short_description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
stars: Elijah Wood, Ian Mc, Kellen, Viggo Mortensen
short_description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Fight Club
stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
short_description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Inception
stars: Leonardo Di, Caprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page
short_description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
short_description: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins training with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

title: The Matrix
stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
short_description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: GoodFellas
stars: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci
short_description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
stars: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman
short_description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

title: Interstellar
stars: Matthew Mc, Conaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
short_description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: Seven
stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey
short_description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
stars: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore
short_description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Seven Samurai
stars: Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima
short_description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn
short_description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Saving Private Ryan
stars: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore
short_description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: City of God
stars: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele
short_description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: The Green Mile
stars: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse
short_description: A death row guard learns that a gentle giant in his charge possesses a mysterious gift.

title: Life Is Beautiful
stars: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini
short_description: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong
short_description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
short_description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
short_description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Spirited Away
stars: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino
short_description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: The Pianist
stars: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay
short_description: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

title: Gladiator
stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
short_description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Parasite
stars: Song Kang-ho, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong
short_description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Psycho
stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles
short_description: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

title: The Lion King
stars: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
short_description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
stars: Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi
short_description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: The Departed
stars: Leonardo Di, Caprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson
short_description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Whiplash
stars: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist
short_description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Harakiri
stars: Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama, Shima Iwashita
short_description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: American History X
stars: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo
short_description: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

title: The Prestige
stars: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson
short_description: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: Leon
stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman
short_description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
stars: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry
short_description: Traveling across the multiverse, Miles Morales meets a new team of Spider-People, made up of heroes from different dimensions. But when the heroes clash over how to deal with a new threat, Miles finds himself at a crossroads.

title: Casablanca
stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid
short_description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: The Usual Suspects
stars: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri
short_description: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Untouchable
stars: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny
short_description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Cinema Paradiso
stars: Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili
short_description: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

title: Modern Times
stars: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman
short_description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Alien
stars: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
short_description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

title: Rear Window
stars: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey
short_description: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
stars: Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale
short_description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

title: Django Unchained
stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo Di, Caprio
short_description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: City Lights
stars: Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee
short_description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: Apocalypse Now
stars: Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall
short_description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Dune: Part Two
stars: Timothée Chalamet, Zendaya, Rebecca Ferguson
short_description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future.

title: Memento
stars: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano
short_description: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

title: WALL·E
stars: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin
short_description: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
stars: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
short_description: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

title: The Lives of Others
stars: Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch
short_description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
stars: Robert Downey Jr.Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo
short_description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Sunset Blvd.
stars: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim
short_description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
stars: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld
short_description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Paths of Glory
stars: Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou
short_description: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
stars: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Laughton
short_description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: The Shining
stars: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd
short_description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

title: The Great Dictator
stars: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie
short_description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: 12th Fail
stars: Vikrant Massey, Medha Shankr, Anant Joshi
short_description: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

title: Aliens
stars: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn
short_description: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

title: Inglourious Basterds
stars: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth
short_description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway
short_description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: Coco
stars: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt
short_description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Amadeus
stars: F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge
short_description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: Toy Story
stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles
short_description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Avengers: Endgame
stars: Robert Downey Jr.Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
short_description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Good Will Hunting
stars: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck
short_description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Oldboy
stars: Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-tae, Kang Hye-jeong
short_description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
stars: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden
short_description: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to global nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

title: American Beauty
stars: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch
short_description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Das Boot
stars: Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann
short_description: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

title: Braveheart
stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick Mc, Goohan
short_description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Princess Mononoke
stars: Yôji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, Yûko Tanaka
short_description: While seeking to cure himself of a curse, young warrior Ashitaka stumbles into a conflict between the people of Iron Town and Princess Mononoke, a girl raised by wolves, who will stop at nothing to prevent the destruction of her home.

title: Your Name.
stars: Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryo Narita
short_description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: High and Low
stars: Toshirô Mifune, Yutaka Sada, Tatsuya Nakadai
short_description: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

title: 3 Idiots
stars: Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh
short_description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

title: Joker
stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz
short_description: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
stars: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth Mc, Govern
short_description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Capernaum
stars: Zain Al Rafeea, Yordanos Shiferaw, Boluwatife Treasure Bankole
short_description: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

title: Singin' in the Rain
stars: Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds
short_description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

title: Come and See
stars: Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Liubomiras Laucevicius
short_description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

title: Requiem for a Dream
stars: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly
short_description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Toy Story 3
stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack
short_description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
short_description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

title: The Hunt
stars: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp
short_description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
stars: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson
short_description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

title: Ikiru
stars: Takashi Shimura, Nobuo Kaneko, Shin'ichi Himori
short_description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester
short_description: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

title: Reservoir Dogs
stars: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen
short_description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: The Apartment
stars: Jack Lemmon, Shirley Mac, Laine, Fred Mac, Murray
short_description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

title: Incendies
stars: Lubna Azabal, Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin, Maxim Gaudette
short_description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
stars: Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn
short_description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: Scarface
stars: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer
short_description: In the 1980s, a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Miami, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

title: Double Indemnity
stars: Fred Mac, Murray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson
short_description: An insurance representative is seduced by a dissatisfied housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

title: North by Northwest
stars: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason
short_description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

title: Heat
stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer
short_description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

title: Citizen Kane
stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore
short_description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

title: Up
stars: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger
short_description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: M
stars: Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann, Inge Landgut
short_description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Full Metal Jacket
stars: Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey, Vincent D'Onofrio
short_description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

title: Vertigo
stars: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes
short_description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

title: Amélie
stars: Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus
short_description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, young waitress Amelie decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey during which she finds true love.

title: A Clockwork Orange
stars: Malcolm Mc, Dowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates
short_description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

title: A Separation
stars: Payman Maadi, Leila Hatami, Sareh Bayat
short_description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
stars: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton
short_description: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

title: Oppenheimer
stars: Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon
short_description: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bombs that brought an end to World War II.

title: Die Hard
stars: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia
short_description: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: The Sting
stars: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw
short_description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: Like Stars on Earth
stars: Darsheel Safary, Aamir Khan, Tisca Chopra
short_description: A young boy is thought to be nothing but a lazy troublemaker until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
stars: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody
short_description: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

title: Metropolis
stars: Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel, Gustav Fröhlich
short_description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Snatch
stars: Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Stephen Graham
short_description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

stars: Dean-Charles Chapman, George Mac, Kay, Daniel Mays
short_description: April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: L.A. Confidential
stars: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce
short_description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Bicycle Thieves
stars: Lamberto Maggiorani, Enzo Staiola, Lianella Carell
short_description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

title: Downfall
stars: Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Ulrich Matthes
short_description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

title: Dangal
stars: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh
short_description: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfill his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.

title: Taxi Driver
stars: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd
short_description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: Hamilton
stars: Lin-Manuel Miranda, Phillipa Soo, Leslie Odom Jr.
short_description: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
stars: Leonardo Di, Caprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie
short_description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Batman Begins
stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe
short_description: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: Green Book
stars: Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini
short_description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: For a Few Dollars More
stars: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volontè
short_description: Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to track down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.

title: The Truman Show
stars: Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney
short_description: An insurance salesman begins to suspect that his whole life is actually some sort of reality TV show.

title: Some Like It Hot
stars: Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon
short_description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Judgment at Nuremberg
stars: Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark
short_description: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their actions.

title: The Kid
stars: Charles Chaplin, Edna Purviance, Jackie Coogan
short_description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

title: Shutter Island
stars: Leonardo Di, Caprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo
short_description: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: The Father
stars: Anthony Hopkins, Olivia Colman, Mark Gatiss
short_description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. When he tries to understand what is happening around him, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

title: All About Eve
stars: Bette Davis, Anne Baxter, George Sanders
short_description: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

title: Jurassic Park
stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
short_description: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

title: There Will Be Blood
stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano, Ciarán Hinds
short_description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Casino
stars: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci
short_description: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: The Sixth Sense
stars: Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette
short_description: After being shot by a resentful former patient whom he failed to help, a Philadelphia child psychologist seeks redemption by treating a young boy with a disturbing secret.

title: Ran
stars: Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao, Jinpachi Nezu
short_description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller
short_description: The story involves Maverick confronting his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.

title: No Country for Old Men
stars: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin
short_description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: The Thing
stars: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David
short_description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
stars: Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López
short_description: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

title: Unforgiven
stars: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman
short_description: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

title: I'm Still Here
stars: Fernanda Torres, Fernanda Montenegro, Selton Mello
short_description: A mother is forced to reinvent herself when her family's life is shattered by an act of arbitrary violence during the tightening grip of a military dictatorship in Brazil, 1971.

title: A Beautiful Mind
stars: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly
short_description: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah
short_description: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
stars: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt
short_description: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: Yojimbo
stars: Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai
short_description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Prisoners
stars: Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, Viola Davis
short_description: Keller Dover is facing every parent's worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is an RV that had been parked on their street.

title: Finding Nemo
stars: Albert Brooks, Ellen De, Generes, Alexander Gould
short_description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: The Great Escape
stars: Steve Mc, Queen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough
short_description: Allied officers in a German prisoner of war camp during World War II making a daring plan for a mass escape by hundreds of their men, hoping to draw German personnel and resources away from combat operations.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
stars: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle
short_description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
stars: Chieko BaishôTakuya Kimura, Tatsuya Gashûin
short_description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: The Elephant Man
stars: Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft
short_description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: Dial M for Murder
stars: Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings
short_description: A London playboy plots the perfect murder of his rich, unfaithful Wife.

title: Gone with the Wind
stars: Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell
short_description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Rashomon
stars: Toshirô Mifune, Machiko KyôMasayuki Mori
short_description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Klaus
stars: Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones
short_description: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Chinatown
stars: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston
short_description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
stars: Ricardo Darín, Soledad Villamil, Pablo Rago
short_description: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
stars: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran
short_description: When four small-time criminals lose a rigged poker game against a London kingpin, he gives them one week to settle their enormous debt.

title: V for Vendetta
stars: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves
short_description: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

title: Inside Out
stars: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black
short_description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: The Wild Robot
stars: Lupita Nyong'o, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor
short_description: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
stars: Frances Mc, Dormand, Woody Harrelson, Sam Rockwell
short_description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
stars: William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins
short_description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

title: Trainspotting
stars: Ewan Mc, Gregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller
short_description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

title: Raging Bull
stars: Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci
short_description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

title: Catch Me If You Can
stars: Leonardo Di, Caprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken
short_description: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Fargo
stars: William H. Macy, Frances Mc, Dormand, Steve Buscemi
short_description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Warrior
stars: Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte, Joel Edgerton
short_description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint
short_description: As the battle between the forces of good and evil in the wizarding world escalates, Harry Potter draws ever closer to his final confrontation with Voldemort.

title: Gran Torino
stars: Clint Eastwood, Bee Vang, Christopher Carley
short_description: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.

title: Million Dollar Baby
stars: Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood, Morgan Freeman
short_description: Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
stars: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch
short_description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: My Neighbour Totoro
stars: Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto
short_description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
stars: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult
short_description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

title: Ben-Hur
stars: Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins, Stephen Boyd
short_description: A Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, but it's not long before he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Children of Heaven
stars: Reza Naji, Amir Farrokh Hashemian, Bahare Seddiqi
short_description: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

title: Barry Lyndon
stars: Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee
short_description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: 12 Years a Slave
stars: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Kenneth Williams, Michael Fassbender
short_description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Before Sunrise
stars: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert
short_description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: Dead Poets Society
stars: Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke
short_description: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

title: Blade Runner
stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
short_description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
stars: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric
short_description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
stars: Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey
short_description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

title: Gone Girl
stars: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris
short_description: The husband of a missing woman becomes the chief suspect in her disappearance.

title: Memories of Murder
stars: Song Kang-ho, Kim Sang-kyung, Kim Roe-ha
short_description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: In the Name of the Father
stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Alison Crosbie
short_description: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

title: Monsters, Inc.
stars: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs
short_description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Ratatouille
stars: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt
short_description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: The Gold Rush
stars: Charles Chaplin, Mack Swain, Tom Murray
short_description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Wild Tales
stars: Darío Grandinetti, María Marull, Mónica Villa
short_description: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
stars: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
short_description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Sherlock Jr.
stars: Buster Keaton, Kathryn Mc, Guire, Joe Keaton
short_description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Jaws
stars: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss
short_description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Mary and Max
stars: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Eric Bana
short_description: In 1976 Melbourne, a lonely 8-year-old girl strikes up a correspondence with an unlikely pen pal: a severely obese 44-year-old New Yorker with Asperger's syndrome.

title: The Deer Hunter
stars: Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale
short_description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

title: The General
stars: Buster Keaton, Marion Mack, Glen Cavender
short_description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

title: Le Mans '66
stars: Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal
short_description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: The Wages of Fear
stars: Yves Montand, Charles Vanel, Peter van Eyck
short_description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: On the Waterfront
stars: Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Lee J. Cobb
short_description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
stars: James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains
short_description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

title: Wild Strawberries
stars: Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson, Ingrid Thulin
short_description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Logan
stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen
short_description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: The Third Man
stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli
short_description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Rocky
stars: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
short_description: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Maharaja
stars: Vijay Sethupathi, Anurag Kashyap, Mamta Mohandas
short_description: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object. His quest to recover the elusive "lakshmi" unfolds.

title: Tokyo Story
stars: Chishû RyûChieko Higashiyama, Sô Yamamura
short_description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: The Big Lebowski
stars: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore
short_description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Spotlight
stars: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel Mc, Adams
short_description: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: The Seventh Seal
stars: Max von Sydow, Gunnar Björnstrand, Bengt Ekerot
short_description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: The Terminator
stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
short_description: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

title: Room
stars: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers
short_description: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
stars: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom
short_description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: La haine
stars: Vincent Cassel, Hubert KoundéSaïd Taghmaoui
short_description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: Jai Bhim
stars: Suriya, Lijo Mol Jose, Manikandan K.
short_description: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

title: Hotel Rwanda
stars: Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Joaquin Phoenix
short_description: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

title: Platoon
stars: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe
short_description: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

title: Before Sunset
stars: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff
short_description: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
stars: Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March
short_description: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: The Exorcist
stars: Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow, Linda Blair
short_description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
stars: Maria Falconetti, Eugene Silvain, André Berley
short_description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

title: The Wizard of Oz
stars: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger
short_description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

title: The Incredibles
stars: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter
short_description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

title: The Sound of Music
stars: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker
short_description: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Rush
stars: Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde
short_description: James Hunt and Niki Lauda, two extremely skilled Formula One racers, have an intense rivalry with each other. However, it is their enmity that pushes them to their limits.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Tsuzumi Mansion Arc
stars: Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa
short_description: Professor Wilson discovers a lost Akita puppy on his way home. Despite objections from his wife, Hachi endears himself to the family and grows to be Parker's loyal companion. As their bond grows deeper, a beautiful relationship unfolds.

title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
stars: Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa
short_description: Professor Wilson discovers a lost Akita puppy on his way home. Despite objections from his wife, Hachi endears himself to the family and grows to be Parker's loyal companion. As their bond grows deeper, a beautiful relationship unfolds.

title: Stand by Me
stars: Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman
short_description: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

title: Network
stars: Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch
short_description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about mass media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

title: My Father and My Son
stars: Çetin Tekindor, Fikret Kuskan, Hümeyra
short_description: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

title: The Handmaiden
stars: Kim Min-hee, Ha Jung-woo, Cho Jin-woong
short_description: In 1930s Korea, a girl is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress who lives a secluded life on a countryside estate. But the maid has a secret: She is a pickpocket recruited by a swindler to help seduce the Lady and steal her fortune.

title: The Iron Giant
stars: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr.Jennifer Aniston
short_description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: To Be or Not to Be
stars: Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack
short_description: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: The Battle of Algiers
stars: Brahim Hadjadj, Jean Martin, Yacef Saadi
short_description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

title: Into the Wild
stars: Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn, Catherine Keener
short_description: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
stars: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell, John Carradine
short_description: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: Groundhog Day
stars: Bill Murray, Andie Mac, Dowell, Chris Elliott
short_description: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

title: A Silent Voice
stars: Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami, Aoi Yûki
short_description: A deaf girl, Shoko, is bullied by the popular Shoya. As Shoya continues to bully Shoko, the class turns its back on him. Shoko transfers and Shoya grows up as an outcast. Alone and depressed, the regretful Shoya finds Shoko to make amends.

title: The Help
stars: Viola Davis, Emma Stone, Octavia Spencer
short_description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

title: Amores perros
stars: Emilio Echevarría, Gael García Bernal, Goya Toledo
short_description: An amateur dog fighter, a supermodel, and a derelict assassin, all separately struggling to find love, find their lives transformed by a devastating car wreck in Mexico City.

title: Rebecca
stars: Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders
short_description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Drishyam
stars: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu
short_description: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
